channel.title: How do i make me admin?
channel.description: ok im working on a sever it runs but i need to know how to make players mods or admin and to make me a admin please help :)

item.title: How do i make me admin?
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

if you already got a source then make a hamachi server to start off. Just go to ham and click the triangle and click “Create network” fill out the information. Then go to control panel, security and click windows firewall. shut it off then go to the exceptions tab and click add port. put hamachi then for the port number put the port of your server and then click ok.

If you haven’t got a source, follow this link.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make me admin?
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

Step#1: Open up your character file…
Step#2:Then open up the charecters file you want to edit,
Step#3:Now, under the part [CHARACTER], you should find ‘character-rights = 0’. If you want to make them a mod(silver crown) change the 0, to a 1. If you want to make them an admin(gold crown) change the 0, to a 2. If you want to make them the owner, change the 0 to a 3

and to change what npc says go to NPCHandler.java and find where it says thug life is offline and change it what you want to say.

Read full topic
